stories.text: For years I used a Wacom tablet stylus as I felt it helped lessen my wrist pain.  However I stopped using it once I read the driver was tracking my use: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=22247292.  Now I just use a standard Logitech mouse though it is old, and the buttons are starting to fail.  I use Kinesis Ergo keyboard and absolutely love it.  I am considering a Kinesis Vertical Mouse: https://kinesis-ergo.com/products/#mice-and-pointing-devices though the idea of a vertical mouse seems strange to me.   Anyone have experience with it or something else?  There are some old HN threads about this. I am looking for up to date options.
stories.title: Ask HN: Recommend an ergonomic or quality mouse in 2021?
